column3: Jewel Ens continued to act as manager in the absence of Donie Bush who found it necessary to remain at his home in Indianapolis where his aged mother is ill.  Her nerves were badly shattered by the shock that followed the death of another son, Michael, who was killed last week in an auto collision.FILENAME_TX"

Stephenson's take-out slide forced an errant throw to 1B, but Hargreaves backed it up when it rebounded from the stand and ran to 1B.  Grimm had run past 1B and turned toward 2B, but was tagged out by the catcher while trying to get back to 1B.1929PIT.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

Both runners started to run on a short PB.  Bartell scooted back to 3B when Schulte made a quick recovery, but Hemsley was run down.  Bartell then scored before English could peg to the plate in time.1929PIT.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

Into RF stands. A big argument stopped the game.  Ump Rigler apparently allowed a single on the ball but, after an argument from the Giants, he consulted with the umpire at 1B (Jorda) who allowed a HR.  Jorda was in a better position to judge the ball which bounded back onto the playing field after hitting in the stands.1929PIT.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
